channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: @GenJones1964 @daveschechter @dick_nixon Fuller context: https://t.co/FzRRnmNY55
Counterpoint: A Christian theocracy in the US would increase American Jewish identity and aliyah. https://t.co/fRJ6Tbp63p
@daveschechter @dick_nixon Speaking of marijuana…. https://t.co/K44UH2gc52
@AvBronstein Can you link to Eis?
@trekonomics Do I recall correctly that he’s a history truther now? Or was that someone else?
@YehudahMirsky Good thing that Democratic party“moderates” stood firm against Biden undoing the former guy’s tax cuts.
"Shared democratic values" https://t.co/r0SUwFPNQo

@Shmarya Great! So he’ll know where the money is buried, and can get to work immediately in turning the apartments into affordable housing, right?
@Shmarya (I expect only the best from recent Bergen County residents!)
@smbahr14 @THECITYNY Time to nationalize the national pastime in the public interest.
Ringo tried to warn us. https://t.co/eBazrKDJPk
@koshersemite Hyman is funny because it’s an obscure character in the King James translation but of the Book of Kings that became the English version of Chaim.
@trekonomics Worse: only soccer. ⚽️
@tashakaminsky @mordkhetzvi So what is the best filling for Purim knishes for those who undergo regular drug testing?
@Lori_Brauner @JTAnews has the interview: https://t.co/TawmiIA0AV
@KevinMKruse Is that viable in terms of helicopter lifting capacity?
@prof_dainy Hmmm. It may be time to think about exhibiting.
Time to nationalize the national pastime. https://t.co/CAZNHksr0X
@jeremyfprice @rmneiss They pivoted because they’re not fools. Just knaves.
@prof_dainy To be fair, murder convinced plenty of gentiles to adopt Christianity.
@froomkin What happened to Ezra?

@rmneiss Hmmm. Wonder whether it’s because of concern over the impact on Russian Jews, or from influence of the Trump/Putin faction, which I don’t think have infiltrated any of the members as thoroughly as they took over Tablet, but who knows?
@rmneiss Funny how the organization that claims to be the most representative is the least transparent.
@p_jeanne97 @DrOz Here’s the allegation. https://t.co/DrETvF8NMd
@p_jeanne97 @DrOz Adams, allegedly.
